title: SPY ALS ICE BUCKET CHALLENGE
description:
We are responding to the numerous ALS Ice Bucket Challenges that we've received, especially the ones from Glasses.com and Ride Cyclery, but with a twist. 

We are donating to both ALS and Thirst Project in an effort to provide clean water to communities in need across the globe. 

Sanuk, Nixon and Sun Diego now have 24 hours to participate and donate!
